summary: WHILE TRAVELING AT HIGHWAY SPEED WITHOUT ANY INDICATION VEHICLE  CAUGHT ON FIRE.   *AK   THE VEHICLE WAS NINE WEEKS OLD WHEN THE VEHICLE CAUGHT ON FIRE.  THE SOURCE OF THE FIRE WAS A FLAMMABLE FLUID.  THERE WAS A LIQUID TRAIL ABOUT ONE FOOT WIDE AND 100 YARDS LONG ON THE ROAD WHICH LEAD UP TO THE MOTORHOME.  IT WAS DIFFICULT TO DETERMINE THE EXACT CAUSE OF THE FIRE.   THE FAILURE WAS NARROWED DOWN TO EITHER THE TRANSMISSION OR THE BRAKE LINE.  *SCC   *NLM
